mapper.select: select * from kcd_gsrykh where khgsname=#{0} and khlevel=#{1} and khrname=#{2} and khsfznum=#{3} and khphonenum=#{4}
select * from kcd_gsrykh order by khtime desc
mapper.update: update kcd_gsrykh set kd=#{kd} where ckey=#{ckey}
mapper.insert: insert into kcd_gsrykh( khid, khgsname, khlevel, khrname, khsfznum, khphonenum, khtime, ckey, kd, username, password, uptime, czrid, gsid, api_reurl )values( #{khid}, #{khgsname}, #{khlevel}, #{khrname}, #{khsfznum}, #{khphonenum}, #{khtime}, #{ckey}, #{kd}, #{username}, #{password}, #{uptime}, #{czrid}, #{gsid}, #{api_reurl} )
